bug.short_desc: asus thunderboltex3 cause thunderbolt module exist with Function not implemented
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
the linux kernel does not load a driver for this card Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): linux 4.8.4
How reproducible: every time
Steps to Reproduce: 1. sudo modprobe thunderbolt 2. 3.
Actual results: ERROR: could not insert 'thunderbolt': Function not implemented
Expected results: thunderbolt module should load
Additional info: I have ASUS X99/USB 3.2 card with latest bios update. https://www.asus.com/us/Motherboards/X99AUSB_31/
The system runs in uefi mode with secure boot turn off.

Update. I have manage to get card appear with lspci -vt but the usb part of this card is nor working.
